PROJECTS

7 Wonders Duel

Basic implementation of the 2 person board game “7 Wonders Duel” in an online and real time interactive board.
Made with ReactJS and Socket.IO

Github

slim-3-multilingual

Extension to the Slim PHP micro-framework v3, to enable language based routing, i.e. i18n and l10n.

Github
Packagist

TimberSage

Adaptation of Sage 8.5.4 WordPress starter theme, with the addition of Timber for painless WordPress development. Developed for internal use @ Brief Creatives

Github

Gettext parser for Twig in WordPress development

Parser of Twig files to find gettext function calls (e.g. __(), __n, _x(), etc) to output a POT file for translation.

Context: github.com/timber/timber/issues/1465, github.com/timber/timber/pull/1711

Github Gist

myboilerplate

Front-end boilerplate with basic the tools needed to start the development of simple web pages/apps.

Github
